languages.text: "Жду не дождусь, когда эта удаль выветрится, и Лорд-капитан осознает, насколько комфортен {mf|его|ее} трон".
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
languages.original_text: "Жду не дождусь, когда эта удаль выветрится, и Лорд-капитан осознает, насколько комфортен {mf|его|ее} трон".

traits.locale_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this daring streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this daring streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
"I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

languages.text: "Ich für meinen Teil kann es kaum erwarten, bis diese kühne Phase ihr Ende nimmt und der Lord Captain erkennt, wie bequem sein Thron ist."
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

traits.locale_text: "Ich für meinen Teil kann es kaum erwarten, bis diese kühne Phase ihr Ende nimmt und der Lord Captain erkennt, wie bequem sein Thron ist."

languages.text: « Pour ma part, j'ai hâte que cette lubie lui passe et que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} comprenne enfin à quel point son trône est confortable. »
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ma part, j'ai hâte que cette lubie lui passe et que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} comprenne enfin à quel point son trône est confortable. »

languages.text: «Por mi parte, ardo en deseos de que estas ansias aventureras se le pasen pronto y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dé cuenta de lo cómodo que es su trono».
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

traits.locale_text: «Por mi parte, ardo en deseos de que estas ansias aventureras se le pasen pronto y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se dé cuenta de lo cómodo que es su trono».

languages.text: 「私は、この大胆な筋書きが過ぎ去り、ロード・キャプテンが王座の快適さを実感するまでなど待ちきれない」
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、この大胆な筋書きが過ぎ去り、ロード・キャプテンが王座の快適さを実感するまでなど待ちきれない」

languages.text: “我真的迫不及待希望舰长大人这股渴望冒险的劲头赶紧过去，早日意识到{mf|他|她}的宝座有多么舒适。”
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

traits.locale_text: “我真的迫不及待希望舰长大人这股渴望冒险的劲头赶紧过去，早日意识到{mf|他|她}的宝座有多么舒适。”

languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."

languages.text: "Kendi adıma cüretkâr mizacının sona ermesiyle Lord Kaptan'ın tahtının ne kadar da rahat olduğunu fark etmesini sabırsızlıkla bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I, for one, cannot wait until this bold streak passes and the Lord Captain realises just how comfortable {mf|his|her} throne is."
